attributes.action: stop the active genocide in myanmaar and provide aid & shelter to the refugees
attributes.background:
Rohingyan muslims are being killed, raped and burned to death. Their houses are being arsoned . This is a 21st century genocide! where is the help

They are in desperate need of AID, the world leaders need to do more than just condemn the atrocity and provide aid to the desparte rohingyan Muslims.
